com.snamp

Class ConcurrentResourceAccess<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock
      • com.snamp.ConcurrentResourceAccess<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type of the resource to hold.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock

    public class ConcurrentResourceAccess<R>
extends java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock
    Provides thread-safe access to the thread-unsafe resource.

    This class allows to apply the following operations on the stored resource:

    • Reading from the resource
    • Writing to the resource
    • Changing the resource

    All reading operations will be executed concurrently. All writing operations will be executed sequentially. Example:
    final class Container{
         private final ConcurrentResourceAccess<Map<String, String>> map =
           new ConcurrentResourceAccess<>(new HashMap<>());

         public String get(final String key){
           return map.invoke(new ConcurrentResourceAccess.ConsistentReader<Map<String, String>, String>(){
             public String invoke(final Map<String, String> map){
               return map.get(key);
             }
           });
         }

         public void put(final Entry<String, String> entry){
           map.write(new ConcurrentResourceAccess.ConsistentWriter<Map<String, String>, Entry<String, String>, Void>(){
             public Void write(final Map<String, String> m, final Entry<String, String> entry){
               m.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
               return null;
             }
           }, entry);
         }
     }

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roman Sakno

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ConcurrentResourceAccess.ConsistentReader<R,V>
      Represents resource reader that cannot throws an exception during reading operation.
      static interface  ConcurrentResourceAccess.ConsistentWriter<R,I,O>
      Represents resource writer that cannot throws an exception.
      static interface  ConcurrentResourceAccess.Reader<R,V,E extends java.lang.Throwable>
      Represents resource reader that can throws an exception during reading operation.
      static interface  ConcurrentResourceAccess.Writer<R,I,O,E extends java.lang.Throwable>
      Represents resource writer that can throws an exception during writing operation.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public final <V> V invoke(ConcurrentResourceAccess.ConsistentReader<R,V> reader)
        Provides consistent invoke on the resource.

        This operation acquires invoke-lock on the resource.

        Type Parameters:
        V - Type of the resource reading value operation.
        Parameters:
        reader - The resource reader.
        Returns:
        The value obtained from the resource.

      • invoke

        public final <V,E extends java.lang.Throwable> V invoke(ConcurrentResourceAccess.Reader<R,V,E> reader)
             throws E extends java.lang.Throwable
        Provides inconsistent invoke on the resource.

        This operation acquires invoke-lock on the resource.

        Type Parameters:
        V - Type of the resource reading value operation.
        E - Type of the exception that can be raised by reader.
        Parameters:
        reader - The resource reader.
        Returns:
        The reading operation result.
        Throws:
        E - Type of the exception that can be raised by reader.
        E extends java.lang.Throwable

      • changeResource

        public final void changeResource(R newResource)
        Changes the resource.

        This operation acquires write-lock on the resource.

        Parameters:

      • changeResource

        public final void changeResource(Activator<? extends R> newResource)
        Changes the resource.

        This operation acquires write-lock on the resource.

        Parameters:
        newResource - The factory of the new resource. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - newResource is null.
